question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, Which term refers to the end of the story, or the very last event that takes place?
description: The image features a stylized text that reads "AND THEY LIVED Happily EVER AFTER." The word "Happily" is written in a cursive, ornate font, with the letter "H" being particularly large and decorative. The rest of the text is in a simpler, serif font. The phrase "EVER AFTER" is also written in a cursive style, with a flourish underneath it. The overall design is elegant and suggests a fairy tale ending.
